title: Transfer a plot of land for the Rights to Servitude and Services of the buyers of Condominium Units residing in Waterfront Properties (Private) Limited
decision_details: - The Board of Investment of Sri Lanka has granted a land plot of 3.03 acres for a period of 99 years to John Keells Holdings PLC or its nominee on a long term lease basis for the implementation of a mixed development project related to the tourism industry including the development of luxury condominium type housing facilities. Accordingly, an agreement has been reached between Waterfront Properties (Private) Limited, the nominee of John Keells Holdings PLC and the  Board of Investment of Sri Lanka, to implement the relevant project. As of now,  out of the 06 towers expected to be built under the project, 03 towers including 425 residential condominium/apartment units have been completed and commercial operations have also been started, and the construction of remaining 03 towers are being carried out. A land area in extent of 60.5 perches included in the leased land outside the land portion belonging to the condominium property, has been utilized to provide services of the condominium buyers. The said land section has been used for the construction of common facilities such as  television, telephone/telecommunications services, roads etc. Therefore, the proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Investment Promotion to transfer the rights to Servitude and Services traversing through the said land to the use of residential condominium buyers of Waterfront Properties (Private) Limited, was approved by the Cabinet.
